constituent: formerly, increase, horns, rice field, brains, sun, day
heisigComment: * The primitive meaning, increase, comes from the next frame. Always think of something multiplying wildly as you watch.
heisigStory: This primitive (named for its associations with the kanji of the following frame) is composed of a pair of horns growing out of a brain with a tongue wagging in the mouth beneath. Think of "former" in connection with administrators or heads of state who have just left office but continue to make a nuisance of themselves by advertising their opinions on public policy.
koohiiStory1: The Artist formerly Known as Prince has the horniest brain around, and I think you can imagine what his wagging tongue is doing...
koohiiStory2: Formerly, horned animals were used to plough the ricefield, and it took all day. Nowadays it´s done by machine.
myStory: cũ. cựu. ngày đất toả sáng là cựu rồi
